医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
部落卫生领导人表示，联邦政府尚未将梅毒疫情视为突发公共卫生事件娜塔莉·霍尔特几乎到处都能看到南达科他州长达数年的梅毒疫情造成的严重伤亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Tribal-health-leaders-say-feds-havene28099t-treatment-syphilis-outbreak-as-a-public-health-emergency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Tribal-health-leaders-say-feds-havene28099t-treatment-syphilis-outbreak-as-a-public-health-emergency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=342c3965-236a-4ad6-b514-1742bca8e119 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 07:08:00 -0500 Tribal health leaders say feds haven’t treated syphilis outbreak as a public health emergency
12 个州承诺公开其阿片类药物结算基金的账簿。我们对他们进行了检查。要了解爱达荷州如何花费数百万美元的阿片类药物和解资金，您可以访问州总检察长的网站，该网站包含来自获得这笔资金的州和地方实体的 91 份文件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/12-states-promised-to-open-the-books-on-their-opioid-settlement-funds-We-checked-up-on-them。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/12-states-promised-to-open-the-books-on-their-opioid-settlement-funds-We-checked-up-on-them。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cad3aaf8-8a02-4884-b7c6-cdb054d7b6fe Thu, 07 Nov 2024 07:06:09 -0500 12 states promised to open the books on their opioid settlement funds. We checked up on them.
细菌如何引发结肠癌研究表明细菌粘附素如何导致结肠癌突变，为结直肠癌的治疗干预提供了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/How-bacteria-trigger-colon-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/How-bacteria-trigger-colon-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cfc0b2b2-faa1-434f-9a7e-0a6528097a69 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 07:04:00 -0500 How bacteria trigger colon cancer
抗炎细胞因子与糖尿病毛细血管阻塞和认知能力下降有关糖尿病患者 IL-10 升高会导致毛细血管阻塞，进而导致认知缺陷。阻断 IL-10 受体有望改善大脑功能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Anti-炎症-细胞因子-linked-to-capillary-obstruction-and-cognitive-decline-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Anti-炎症-细胞因子-linked-to-capillary-obstruction-and-cognitive-decline-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce066383-8738-4882-8aae-d9b4e3177152 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 06:41:00 -0500 Anti-inflammatory cytokine linked to capillary obstruction and cognitive decline in diabetes
研究揭示了冬虫夏草化学物质如何治疗癌症对冬虫夏草产生的一种化学物质的新研究揭示了它如何与基因相互作用以中断细胞生长信号，这种化学物质有望成为一种可能的癌症治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-reveals-how-caterpillar-fungus-chemical-may-treat-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Research-reveals-how-caterpillar-fungus-chemical-may-treat-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3122e35f-d44b-4c1d-85ea-44dd352dca29 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 06:35:29 -0500 Research reveals how caterpillar fungus chemical may treat cancer
高血压治疗会损害生活质量，尤其是女性这项研究揭示了血压治疗与心理健康之间的复杂关系，倡导个性化护理以提高生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hypertension-treatment-hurts-quality-of-life-special-for-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Hypertension-treatment-hurts-quality-of-life-special-for-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8637237-f120-466d-b6a7-df3eecb7b52d Thu, 07 Nov 2024 06:31:00 -0500 Hypertension treatment hurts quality of life, especially for women
都柏林大学领导欧盟关于细胞外囊泡生物医学研究的重大项目由都柏林大学协调的一个欧盟重大项目将通过探索细胞外囊泡（EV）的变革潜力来推动生物医学研究的前沿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/UCD-leads-major-EU-project-on-extracellular-vesicles-for-biomedical-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/UCD-leads-major-EU-project-on-extracellular-vesicles-for-biomedical-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f5487c7-052c-432e-bdbf-994dead65dbc Thu, 07 Nov 2024 06:18:00 -0500 UCD leads major EU project on extracellular vesicles for biomedical research
新设备改进了机器人辅助心脏手术机器人辅助心脏手术通常需要手术台上的助手帮助外科医生通过小切口插入机器人手臂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-device-improves-robot-assistance-heart-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/New-device-improves-robot-assistance-heart-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba632be4-815f-4178-b804-57212906226c Thu, 07 Nov 2024 06:00:00 -0500 New device improves robot-assisted heart surgery
BEND4的表观遗传沉默揭示了PDAC治疗的新途径胰腺癌治疗领域的一项新发现揭示了 BEND4 的表观遗传沉默可作为潜在的合成致死标记，用于增强 ATM 抑制剂在胰腺癌治疗中的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Epigenic-silencing-of-BEND4-unveils-new-path-for-PDAC-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241107/Epigenic-silencing-of-BEND4-unveils-new-path-for-PDAC-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fced3c67-f45f-4583-a57b-59963f6eefa1 Thu, 07 Nov 2024 00:00:43 -0500 Epigenetic silencing of BEND4 unveils new path for PDAC treatment
新的 SCLC 生物标志物推动精准医学方法的进步2024年10月11日，Oncotarget第15卷发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“Relationship Between the Expressions of DLL3, ASC1, TTF-1 and Ki-67: First Steps of Precision Medicine at SCLC” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-SCLC-biomarkers-enable-advances-in- precision-medicine-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241106/New-SCLC-biomarkers-enable-advances-in- precision-medicine-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1496fc48-646b-4591-80ce-7f18e37f57c6 Wed, 06 Nov 2024 23:56:02 -0500 New SCLC biomarkers enable advances in precision medicine approaches
